sentence.Network_en: Overelaboration characterizes so much of presentday writing,.
sentence.Network_cn: 过分推敲为许多当代作品的特征.

sentence.Network_en: According to our presentday ideas the complier seems somewhat liberal with her butter and sugar.
sentence.Network_cn: 照我们今天的观点看来,汇编者使用奶油和砂糖有点儿大手大脚.

entry.def: Present-day things, situations, and people exist at the time in history we are now in.

example.ex: Even by present-day standards these were large aircraft.
example.tran: 即使按照现在的标准，这些飞机也挺大的。

example.ex: ...a huge area of northern India, stretching from present-day Afghanistan to Bengal.
example.tran: 印度北部的大片地区，从现在的阿富汗一直延伸到孟加拉

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
